**The Supreme Pervading Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Cavern of Reality**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Pavillion Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Cavern of Reality* (abbreviated as *The Jade Purity Hidden Scripture*). Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition. The original text comprised four scrolls and eight chapters, later divided into four separate works:

- *The Supreme Cavern Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Most High for Annihilating Demons and Divine Wisdom of the Lofty Mystery* (three chapters)
- *The Most High Scripture of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture for Annihilating Demons, Divine Wisdom of the Jade Emperor* (three chapters)
- *The Scripture of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Cavern Radiance Golden Prime* (one chapter)
- *The Scripture of the Golden Prime Feathered Chapters of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Most High Cavern* (one chapter)

**Source Text:** *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Section, First Division.

---

### *The Scripture of the Golden Prime Feathered Chapters of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Most High Cavern*

Such are the myriad numinous hidden tones of the *Feathered Chapters Jade Purity Hidden Scripture*, concealed within the Jade Terrace and Jasper Chambers of the Jade Purity Upper Palace by the Most High Jade Emperor. Attending the scripture are the Orchid Court Jade Maidens—An Lǜfàn, Huáng Míngjī, and seven hundred others—along with the Northern Desert Golden Immortals and Jade Lads—Líng Huìcōng, Wáng Dìngyún, and five hundred others—who hold night-shining precious luminants and perpetually scatter the blossoms of the Three Qi’s returning incense to anoint the divine scripture’s supreme essence.

All the Five Emperors, the ten thousand immortals, and the host of sages ascend thrice each month to the Jade Purity Upper Palace to scatter incense, pay homage to the perfected, and offer rites before the divine scripture.

The Great King of the Jade Purity Dispelling Demons of the Northern Terrace’s Golden Mystery Cavern was born amid the primordial kalpa. When the Two Modes divided and the Three Symbols took root, heaven and earth lay veiled in obscurity, dim and profound. He was rightly born in the Northern Desert’s Broad Cold Courtyard, by the banks of the Cold Valley within the Central Plain of Level Mounds. The Primordial was his father, the Mysterious his mother; they wove his form, and with the Three Qi as his name, his taboo is: **__**.

Shedding his purple womb, his six eyes blazed with essence. His body soared ninety million *zhang*, emanating a hundred shifting lights. The Seven Primes intertwined, suffusing his jade form with radiance. The Three Luminants awaited his brilliance, and the sun and moon opened their clarity for him.

Thereupon, the Most High Jade Emperor bestowed upon him the Golden Perfection, Jade Radiance, Purple Script, and Cinnabar Chapters, along with the Jade Seal, Phoenix Casket, and the Banner of Command over Demon Spirits. He was enfeoffed to govern the Nine Mysteries, oversee the Five Peaks, inspect and restrain the Northern Feng, rectify the Three and Five, behead the Six Heavens, and receive his commission in the Upper Palace, his might subduing the myriad spirits.

The Most High assigned seven thousand Jade Maidens of the Jade Terrace and two thousand four hundred Golden Immortals and Jade Lads to scatter blossoms and incense in attendance upon the King. Golden-headed colossal beasts stood guard at the Jade Gates. He ruled the Northern Emperor’s Cold Realm and the Broad Numinous Palace, often riding the Nine-Colored Flowing Bell Flying Chariot with its Purple Canopy, accompanied by a thousand perfected of the Mulberry Grove. Ascending to the Great Void, he roamed the Dark Jade Purity, journeyed east to the Azure Florescence to verify the Square Cauldrons, and traveled west to Tortoise Mountain to register the celestial perfected. In the southern Cavern Yang of the Southern Culmen’s Upper Prime, he excised the dead and inscribed the living, engraving the registers to pacify and prosper. At the center, he paid homage to the Golden Gates of the Most High Jade Capital, receiving his charge from the Boundless and governing the Five Directions. He oversaw life and death in the ledgers, controlled the demonic hordes of the Northern Feng, ruled above the Supreme, and commanded below the Abyssal. The Five Peaks, Four Marshes, Twelve River Sources, and the myriad immortals and numinous hosts—none were not subject to the King.

The Great King of Dispelling Demons rules beneath the Seven-Treasure Palace of the Northern Broad Cold, governing the Northern Fengluo Mountain. This mountain lies in the north, in the *guǐ* region, rising two thousand six hundred *lǐ* with a circumference of thirty thousand *lǐ*. The mountain is entirely adorned with seven-jeweled pearl palaces, all inhabited by ghosts and spirits.

At its base lies a valley ten thousand *zhang* deep, called the Spring of Mound Cold, which is the prison of ghosts and spirits. The Great Demon King of the Northern Emperor resides in the Palace of the Yin-Heaven of Zhòu’s Severed End atop the mountain.

There is a Great Demon King, surnamed Wǎn Gōng, with the taboo **__**, whose official retinue numbers thirty-eight thousand. All their names are subject to the Great King of Dispelling Demons.

Whenever later disciples attain immortality, the Great King of Dispelling Demons commands the Great Demon King to submit their names for approval, after which they may ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Great Demon King constantly seeks to thwart disciples’ studies, resenting their attainment of immortality. Once one achieves immortality, they become a perfected transcendent above the Great Demon King. Thus, disciples are often tested by the Great Demon King, and many fail, defeated by him.

If disciples know the Great Demon King’s secret name and the location of his palace, they will not be subjected to his trials and will naturally receive his endorsement for ascent to the Upper Clarity.

Disciples should regularly recite the incantation of the Hundred Spirits of the Dispelling Demons King to repel the Great Demon’s trials. Once the demonic trials are dispelled, true numina will descend, and one may behold their true form, ascending in broad daylight to the Jade Purity Palace.

The Great Demon King wears a robe of dark script, a crown spanning the heavens, and a belt with a dragon-headed sword. He often rides a feathered chariot, flying through the clouds, and sings a ballad of three thousand words to confuse and corrupt later disciples.

Thus, the Most High recorded its verses in the *Treasure Scripture of Dispelling Demons*. Those who know its tune will not be subjected to trials, nor suffer harm or corruption.

The Great Demon King of the Eastern Azure Emperor is surnamed Pò Luò, with the taboo **__**. He wears a crown spanning the heavens and a robe of azure feathers, with a belt of azure cords and a tiger-headed satchel. Sometimes he dons a crimson unlined garment or transforms into a radiance of azure and vermilion. He commands nine thousand officials and resides in the Eastern Land of Peace, the Age of Nàshàn.

On the day of the vernal equinox, he rides a feathered chariot of azure wheels, flying through the clouds to feast and roam the Five Peaks, testing and corrupting those who study immortality.

Those who cultivate the Dao of immortality should, on this day, enter their chamber facing west and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Purple Dao Void Sovereign Supreme Lord for Dispelling Demons* once. Then, celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested.

After nine years, the Purple Dao Void Sovereign Supreme Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved.

The Dao of the Supreme Jade Form, if lightly divulged, brings destruction to the body and loss of life.

On the day of the vernal equinox, the Jade Controller of the Eastern Azure Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Eastern Azure Emperor and ascends to the Jade Terrace of Yùyuènàlínchāng beneath the Celestial Purple Pavilion of Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Purple Dao Void Sovereign Supreme Lord. On this day, one should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Western White Emperor, surnamed Dèng, styled Érhū, wears a horizontal celestial white crown and a robe of white feathers, with a belt of plain spirit sashes and a five-colored tiger-headed talisman pouch. He may don a black-lined unlined robe or transform into an elderly woman with a white kerchief, holding a golden tablet, or manifest as radiance of purple and azure. Commanding seven thousand officials, he resides in the Western Land of Fortune, the Age of Shèngxíng. On the day of the autumnal equinox, he rides a feathered chariot of white wheels, flying through the clouds to feast and roam the Five Peaks, testing and corrupting those who study immortality. Those who cultivate the Dao of immortality should, on this day, enter their chamber facing south and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Winged Sun Void Sovereign Supreme Dao Lord for Dispelling Demons* once. Then, celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. After twelve years, the Winged Sun Void Sovereign Supreme Dao Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved.

The supreme jade-secret Dao, if lightly divulged, brings destruction to the body and doom to the spirit-officials.

On the day of the autumnal equinox, the Jade Controller of the Western White Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Western White Emperor and ascends to the Jade Tower of Gāotáolìchōnglóngluó beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Winged Sun Void Sovereign Supreme Dao Lord. On this day, one should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Southern Vermilion Emperor, surnamed Zhě, styled Shànghuán, wears a horizontal celestial vermilion crown and a robe of azure feathers, with a belt of cinnabar spirit sashes and a tiger-headed talisman pouch. He may don a yellow gauze robe or take the form of a human-headed bird-bodied being resembling a phoenix, or manifest as radiance of dark and yellow. Commanding eight thousand officials, he resides in the Wǎnlí City Realm, the Age of Qìxián. On the day of the summer solstice, he rides a feathered chariot of vermilion wheels, flying through the clouds to feast and roam the Five Peaks, testing and corrupting those who study immortality. Those who cultivate the Dao of immortality should, on this day, enter their chamber facing north and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Prosperous Yang Ji Void Sovereign High Prime Lord for Dispelling Demons* once. Then, celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. After eighteen years, the Prosperous Yang Ji Void Sovereign High Prime Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved.

The supreme jade-secret Dao, if lightly divulged, brings destruction to the body.

On the day of the summer solstice, the Jade Controller of the Southern Vermilion Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Southern Vermilion Emperor and ascends to the Vermilion Pavilion of Bìluòkōnggēyúlí beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Prosperous Yang Ji Void Sovereign High Prime Lord. On this day, one should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Northern Black Emperor, surnamed Xiāo, styled Yáogōng, wears a horizontal celestial dark crown and a robe of dark feathers, with a belt of dark spirit sashes and a tiger-headed talisman pouch. He may don a black-lined unlined robe or take the form of a human-bodied snake-headed being, or manifest as radiance of azure and white. Commanding five thousand officials, he resides in the Yúdǎn Wilds, the Age of Serenity. On the day of the winter solstice, he rides a feathered chariot of black wheels, flying through the clouds to feast and roam the Five Peaks, testing and corrupting those who study immortality. Those who cultivate the Dao of immortality should, on this day, enter their chamber facing southwest and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Sevenfold Serenity Life-Guiding Supreme Void Sovereign Lord for Dispelling Demons* once. Then, celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. Within fifteen years, the Sevenfold Serenity Life-Guiding Supreme Void Sovereign Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved.

The supreme jade-secret Dao, if lightly divulged, brings destruction to life.

On the day of the winter solstice, the Jade Controller of the Northern Black Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Northern Black Emperor and ascends to the Dark Pavilion of Jiāmótǎnlóuyúyì beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Sevenfold Serenity Life-Guiding Supreme Void Sovereign Lord. On this day, one should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Northwest Hào Emperor, surnamed Guāngmíng, styled Fǎmíng, wears a horizontal celestial purple crown and a robe of purple feathers, with a belt of purple sashes and a tiger-headed talisman pouch. He may don a white gauze unlined robe or take the form of a woman with a flying-cloud coiffure, holding a golden staff, or manifest as radiance of purple and white. Commanding ten thousand officials, he resides in the Northwest Land of Fortune and Virtue, the Age of Yánxián. On the day of the Beginning of Winter, he rides a feathered chariot of purple wheels, flying through the clouds to feast and roam the Five Peaks, testing and corrupting those who study immortality. Those who cultivate the Dao of immortality should, on this day, enter their chamber facing southeast and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Great Brightness Void Sovereign Cavern Purity Lord for Dispelling Demons* once. Then, celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. Within twelve years, the Great Brightness Void Sovereign Cavern Purity Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved.

The supreme jade-secret Dao, if divulged to the world, brings destruction to the body.

On the day of the Beginning of Winter, the Jade Controller of the Northwest Hào Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Northwest Hào Emperor and ascends to the Purple Pavilion of Fúrèngàihuáfúluó beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Great Brightness Void Sovereign Cavern Purity Lord. On this day, the disciple should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Southeast Hào Emperor bears the surname Fāngshēng and the personal name Zāizhǎn. He wears a horizontal Heavenly Yellow Crown, dons a robe of yellow feathers, and girds himself with a tiger-headed pouch tied by a yellow sash. At times, he appears in a single layer of purple gauze, or as a human-headed serpent with a white sash in its mouth, or transforms into a radiance of azure and green hues. He commands an entourage of six thousand officials and resides in the Primordial Blessed Field of the Worthy in the Southeast. On the day of the Beginning of Summer, he rides a yellow-feathered chariot, soaring through the clouds to roam and feast among the Five Peaks, testing and thwarting those who cultivate the immortal Dao. On this day, the disciple should enter their chamber, face the northwest, and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Primordial Void Sovereign Supreme Empyrean Lord for Dispelling Demons* once, whereupon celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. Within fifteen years, the Primordial Void Sovereign Supreme Empyrean Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved. The supreme jade-secret Dao, if divulged to the world, brings destruction to the body.

On the day of the Beginning of Summer, the Jade Controller of the Southeast Hào Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Southeast Hào Emperor and ascends to the Yellow Pavilion of Jùwèiyéqú Chūmò beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Primordial Void Sovereign Supreme Empyrean Lord. On this day, the disciple should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Northeast Cāng Emperor bears the surname Shào and the personal name Wúliàng. He wears a horizontal Heavenly Azure Crown, dons a robe of azure feathers, and girds himself with a tiger-headed pouch tied by an azure sash. At times, he appears in a single layer of green gauze, or as a dragon-headed human with a green staff in hand, or transforms into a spirit of fire. He commands an entourage of nine thousand officials and resides in the Blessed Assembly Capital of Cháng’ān. On the day of the Beginning of Spring, he rides an azure-feathered chariot, soaring through the clouds to roam and feast among the Five Peaks, testing and thwarting those who cultivate the immortal Dao. On this day, the disciple should enter their chamber, face the southwest, and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Seven Observations Non-Being Void Sovereign Golden Numinous Lord for Dispelling Demons* once, whereupon celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. Within ten years, the Seven Observations Non-Being Void Sovereign Golden Numinous Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved. The supreme jade-secret Dao, if divulged, brings calamity to seven generations of ancestors and severs one’s own fate.

On the day of the Beginning of Spring, the Jade Controller of the Northeast Cāng Emperor summons the Great Demon King of the Northeast Cāng Emperor and ascends to the Azure Pavilion of Chōngróng Yùyù Dísā beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Seven Observations Non-Being Void Sovereign Golden Numinous Lord. On this day, the disciple should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon King of the Southwest Huáng Emperor bears the surname Wǔwūyíng and the personal name Tōngbó. He wears a horizontal Heavenly Green Crown, dons a robe of green feathers, and girds himself with a tiger-headed pouch tied by a green sash. At times, he appears in a single layer of yellow gauze, or as a nine-headed figure wielding a golden halberd, or transforms into a radiance of purple and black hues. He commands an entourage of seven thousand officials and resides in the Western Palace’s Extended Blessing Village of Benevolent Tranquility. On the day of the Beginning of Autumn, he rides a green-feathered chariot, soaring through the clouds to roam and feast among the Five Peaks, testing and thwarting those who cultivate the immortal Dao. On this day, the disciple should enter their chamber, face the northeast, and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Eight Observations Lofty Primordial Void Sovereign Radiance-Halting Lord for Dispelling Demons* once, whereupon celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested. Within nine years, the Eight Observations Lofty Primordial Void Sovereign Radiance-Halting Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved. The supreme jade-secret Dao, if divulged, subjects one to trial and destruction, bringing calamity to seven generations.

The Jade Controller of the Southwest Huáng Emperor, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, summons the Great Demon King of the Southwest Huáng Emperor and ascends to the Purple Pavilion of Dānyuán Chábǎo Lúnfǎ beneath Heaven, where he receives his duties from the Jade Purity Eight Observations Lofty Primordial Void Sovereign Radiance-Halting Lord. On this day, the disciple should also recite the *Incantation of Wisdom for Dispelling Demons and the Hundred Spirits* once.

The Great Demon Kings of the Eight Directions were born alongside the Six Heavens, and their officials number in the tens of thousands. When they roam, they are accompanied by ghostly soldiers, banners, canopies, and insignia of the five colors and dark yellow, soaring through the clouds or dwelling among the Five Peaks, descending through the Eight Realms to envy and harm the immortal Dao, testing and thwarting those who cultivate it, unwilling to let them attain immortality. Thus, the Eight Supreme Emperor Lords employ the divine incantations for dispelling demons to restrain them with their majesty. Disciples who know only the supreme taboo names of the Highest Sovereign but not the names of the celestial demons will never achieve the immortal Dao. Those who know the secret names of the demon kings and restrain them with divine incantations will cause the demon kings to submit their names in guarantee, reporting them to the Jade Purity, whereupon the immortal Dao will unfailingly be achieved. This method is profoundly wondrous, concealed by the Supreme in the secluded Seven Treasures Golden Hall of the Dark Coffer, revealed but once in ten thousand kalpas. Without one’s golden name and jade characters recorded in the imperial registers, one will never behold its text. Those who obtain this method will attain immortality without study. The Supreme appoints left officials to execute and guard against negligence, carelessness, or unauthorized disclosure. For those who are not true adepts, seven generations of ancestors will be punished, and one’s own fate will be extinguished, bound in the Three Wretched Realms for ten thousand kalpas without deliverance.

**Hidden Text of the Jade Purity Great King for Dispelling Demons and the Golden Numinous Hundred Spirits Incantation**

The Supreme Void is tranquil and at ease; the four qi are solemn and reverent. The Eight Mysteries of the Profound gather; golden chimes resound through the empty sky. Jade wisdom soars through the empyrean; the cavernous subtle stirs the primordial. The four radiant scenes unfold their numen; the six perfections rest in harmony. Through refinement and transformation, they merge and change; stepping upon rosy clouds, they ascend the peaks. In the high assembly of the Jade Purity, the Three Primordials’ Upper Palace, they attend the banquet of the Nine Emperors before the Eight Luminous Cinnabar Windows. The luminous opens the Dao above; the Seven Primordials shine through. The clear waves mirror the distant; essence scatters in the Jade Chamber. The lofty perfected stand in array, luxuriant as flowing light. Golden immortals hold blossoms; pure spirits disperse fragrance. Flying celestial beasts guard the Jade Emperor. The two images rest in the void; the three luminaries veil the dusk. Divine talismans transform myriad times; the Seven Stars intersect in their courses. The Nine Emperors display their canopies, lingering at the cavern’s gate. Towering and lofty is the Supreme Void; majestic and venerable is virtue. The myriad transformations arise in unity; the dark examines the sacred source. A summons is issued to the Five Emperors; the Upper Primordial is invoked. The demon-dispelling majesty transforms; the returning wind and swift thunder sweep away evil and banish demons. Essence is bound, spirits captured; the Emperor Lord receives his mandate. Those guilty are executed; those meritorious are pardoned. Their names are recorded in the Three Heavens; the great deities who preside over this are the Golden Numinous and Jade Wisdom, all as the jade text decrees. In the vast capital of Yùluó, the disciple’s private existence is preserved. The dark canopy commands all; riding the wheel-less void, they are the ancestors of the hundred spirits. The sun’s radiance shifts and changes; the gate of awakened attainment opens the dharma containing light. Through long kalpas, they swiftly depart from the divine. The resplendent chamber and bright guests—all are the demon kings of the Northern Fēng. Their eerie songs and mysterious chants disrupt our cloudy encampment. The immortals check the names and submit them to the Jade Dawn. The commands of the Supreme are all as the Great Perfected decrees.

Then the Five Elders take up their reins, ascending the lofty and resplendent imperial court. Their feathered skirts and jade sleeves ripple, embroidered capes with flowing bells; golden crowns and purple sashes radiate the sun’s essence, their numinous light illuminating the wheel. Eightfold radiance purifies the mysteries; the Five Thearchs flank the imperial carriage, escorting the Four Luminaries. The grotto-heavens gaze in wonder, wondrous scenes forming cloudy encampments. The gates of heaven unseal, the numinous barriers open in clarity. Soaring through the purple empyrean, the eight paths merge into darkness. The Dao’s subtleties stretch far and wide; wandering dreams ascend to the Upper Clarity. The Seven Sages align in harmony, their principles commanding long life. Thrice they circle and five times they turn, delivering the Seven Stars. The Great One attends to his duties, inscribing records in the immortal court. Ascending the Brahma-realm, treading prosperity, the five qi converge, the Ten Perfections firmly arrayed. The cinnabar names are opened and delivered; the Mysterious Mother rejoices. Eternal life is forever preserved. The White Prime and the Peerless, the Solar Assembly and the Yellow Tranquility—all Five Elders unite in accord. Branches flourish in splendor, preserving the Southern Immortals. None fail to be embraced as embryos; the three qi behold the light. Golden immortals bathe in form, decayed corpses soar in flight, ascending to the Three Clarities. The Great One examines demons; the Celestial Origin captures essence. Trials are extinguished, calamities dissolved—no reckless births are permitted. The Six Masters brandish lightning, hurling fire-bells. Their might shakes the eight realms; the ten directions stand in solemn stillness. Dragons soar and phoenixes glide, ascending to pierce the Four Luminaries. Cinnabar texts record their names; golden scriptures of feathered classics. The world safeguards the radiant dragon, its destiny aligned with the immortal court. The Nine Perfected entwine in harmony; the highest vows are fulfilled. Demons are subdued, protections upheld—soaring to ascend the Jade Clarity.

*The Inner Chapter of the Golden Numinous Hundred Spirits for Dispelling Demons*
A treasure of the August Supreme, concealed within the Jasper Palace, bestowed upon the highest sages, not transmitted to lesser immortals. Those with golden names and jade characters, arrayed in vermilion charts, whose viscera bloom with life—only they may receive this text. Practicing ten thousand repetitions, they ride the radiance and mount the clouds, soaring through the Three Clarities, entering and departing the imperial dawn. They open the way for seven generations of ancestors, severing karmic roots, delivering lives to the Southern Palace, preserving the purple embryo within the primordial womb. They gather the Dao of life from the ten directions, command Jade Wisdom in the golden chamber, seek numinous radiance through wondrous resonance, and embrace the eight assemblies within the nine voids. Thus they summon true radiance to descend in curves, beholding the divine countenance of the Jade Emperor. They await the insignia in the Orchid Court, subduing the celestial demons of the Northern Feng. All who practice this Dao shall, on the eight solar terms and their own birthdays and the days of the Great Year Star, recite the scripture and perform the Dao-circuits, treading upon sacred mountains—always facing north. They shall strike the left teeth thirty-two times, reciting the chapter in a hushed voice. With each recitation, the spirit brightens and qi purifies; celestial demons vanish like shadows, and the immortal Dao naturally manifests. Those who recklessly divulge this method shall see their seven generations of ancestors held accountable, their own lives forfeit, and immortality forever denied.

*The Jade Clarity Purple Dao Hidden Writ of the Golden Numinous Feathered Chapter of the Upper Lord of the Void Emperor Yuyue Nalin Chang in the Heavenly Central Dispelling-Demons Wisdom Incantation*
The four expansions of the Jade Heaven, the eight generations of lofty numina. The Two Nets gleam and fall; Jade Wisdom illumines the Clarity. The golden chant resounds in emptiness, vibrating the purple jasper. A hundred harmonies bind the true; demonic names are checked and restrained. The Three Waves are tranquil; the defiled are purged. Poison is expelled, goodness embraced; whistling commands the ghostly soldiers. The Northern Feng is unbound, roaming the cloudy encampments. The Jade Emperor chants and whistles; the demonic hordes collapse. The Six Heavens vanish like shadows; the Three Paths spread their numina. The August Supreme scatters his radiance; our Dao is now clear. The Great One inscribes the register, attending to the preservation of life. The Duke’s son delivers the talisman, severing the Seven Stars. The five sufferings disperse entirely; decayed bones flourish as immortals. Trials are extinguished, the true preserved. Feathered robes of deep green, girded with gold and jade, interlacing bells flowing. Circling and converging in the Jade Empyrean, together they enter the Yellow Tranquility. Ten thousand prohibitions open the paths; soaring to the Purple Court.

*The Jade Clarity Winged Sun Hidden Writ of the Golden Numinous Feathered Chapter of the Upper Dao Lord of the Void Emperor Gao Tao Li Chong in the Heavenly Central Dispelling-Demons Wisdom Incantation*
Lofty peaches resplendent, the Dragon Net soaring. Golden radiance unfurls, the Four Luminaries gleaming. Radiant clouds flourish in emptiness; vermilion orchids overflow. Jade chambers and purple terraces, intersecting clouds in four directions. The Departed Net spreads its wings; the divine hall stands majestic. The golden numen shines in emptiness, girding the divine kings. The Five Elders and Eight Radiance unite in firm array. The numinous flourishes, Jade Wisdom whistles clear through the void. Flying essence and feathered canopies, dancing wheels in the hollow sky. Thrice entering the Northern Clarity, twice visiting the Upper Palace. Commanding the Northern Emperor, checking and capturing demon kings. Beheading the Six Heavens, purging the Northern Feng’s kalpas. Binding essence and restraining demons, submitting to the Jade Emperor. With a sudden roar, the myriad myriads collapse. The Dao spreads the Three Perfected, perfecting our immortal lords. Ascending the Brahma-realm, treading prosperity, guarding the Crimson Palace. The Controller of Destinies preserves the tally; cinnabar script in the Southern Prosperity. Severing the Seven Mysteries, decayed bones flourish anew. Delivering the Three Paths, soaring through the empyrean peaks. Extinguishing trials and summoning numina, dispelling demons in shared merit. The Dao aligns with the Imperial Unity, riding the radiance and spurring the dragon. **Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Pavillion Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Cavern of Reality* (abbreviated as *The Jade Purity Hidden Scripture*). Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition. The original text comprised four scrolls and eight chapters, later divided into four separate works:

- *The Supreme Cavern Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Most High for Annihilating Demons and Divine Wisdom of the Lofty Mystery* (three chapters)
- *The Most High Scripture of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture for Annihilating Demons, Divine Wisdom of the Jade Emperor* (three chapters)
- *The Scripture of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Cavern Radiance Golden Prime* (one chapter)
- *The Scripture of the Golden Prime Feathered Chapters of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Most High Cavern* (one chapter)

**Source Text:** *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Section, First Division.

---

### *The Scripture of the Golden Prime Feathered Chapters of the Jade Purity Hidden Scripture of the Most High Cavern*

Such are the myriad numinous hidden tones of the *Feathered Chapters Jade Purity Hidden Scripture*, concealed within the Jade Terrace and Jasper Chambers of the Jade Purity Upper Palace by the Most High Jade Emperor. Attending the scripture are the Orchid Court Jade Maidens—An Lǜfàn, Huáng Míngjī, and seven hundred others—along with the Northern Desert Golden Immortals and Jade Lads—Líng Huìcōng, Wáng Dìngyún, and five hundred others—who hold night-shining precious luminants and perpetually scatter the blossoms of the Three Qi’s returning incense to anoint the divine scripture’s supreme essence.

All the Five Emperors, the ten thousand immortals, and the host of sages ascend thrice each month to the Jade Purity Upper Palace to scatter incense, pay homage to the perfected, and offer rites before the divine scripture.

The Great King of the Jade Purity Dispelling Demons of the Northern Terrace’s Golden Mystery Cavern was born amid the primordial kalpa. When the Two Modes divided and the Three Symbols took root, heaven and earth lay veiled in obscurity, dim and profound. He was rightly born in the Northern Desert’s Broad Cold Courtyard, by the banks of the Cold Valley within the Central Plain of Level Mounds. The Primordial was his father, the Mysterious his mother; they wove his form, and with the Three Qi as his name, his taboo is: **__**.

Shedding his purple womb, his six eyes blazed with essence. His body soared ninety million *zhang*, emanating a hundred shifting lights. The Seven Primes intertwined, suffusing his jade form with radiance. The Three Luminants awaited his brilliance, and the sun and moon opened their clarity for him.

Thereupon, the Most High Jade Emperor bestowed upon him the Golden Perfection, Jade Radiance, Purple Script, and Cinnabar Chapters, along with the Jade Seal, Phoenix Casket, and the Banner of Command over Demon Spirits. He was enfeoffed to govern the Nine Mysteries, oversee the Five Peaks, inspect and restrain the Northern Feng, rectify the Three and Five, behead the Six Heavens, and receive his commission in the Upper Palace, his might subduing the myriad spirits.

The Most High assigned seven thousand Jade Maidens of the Jade Terrace and two thousand four hundred Golden Immortals and Jade Lads to scatter blossoms and incense in attendance upon the King. Golden-headed colossal beasts stood guard at the Jade Gates. He ruled the Northern Emperor’s Cold Realm and the Broad Numinous Palace, often riding the Nine-Colored Flowing Bell Flying Chariot with its Purple Canopy, accompanied by a thousand perfected of the Mulberry Grove. Ascending to the Great Void, he roamed the Dark Jade Purity, journeyed east to the Azure Florescence to verify the Square Cauldrons, and traveled west to Tortoise Mountain to register the celestial perfected. In the southern Cavern Yang of the Southern Culmen’s Upper Prime, he excised the dead and inscribed the living, engraving the registers to pacify and prosper. At the center, he paid homage to the Golden Gates of the Most High Jade Capital, receiving his charge from the Boundless and governing the Five Directions. He oversaw life and death in the ledgers, controlled the demonic hordes of the Northern Feng, ruled above the Supreme, and commanded below the Abyssal. The Five Peaks, Four Marshes, Twelve River Sources, and the myriad immortals and numinous hosts—none were not subject to the King.

The Great King of Dispelling Demons rules beneath the Seven-Treasure Palace of the Northern Broad Cold, governing the Northern Fengluo Mountain. This mountain lies in the north, in the *guǐ* region, rising two thousand six hundred *lǐ* with a circumference of thirty thousand *lǐ*. The mountain is entirely adorned with seven-jeweled pearl palaces, all inhabited by ghosts and spirits.

At its base lies a valley ten thousand *zhang* deep, called the Spring of Mound Cold, which is the prison of ghosts and spirits. The Great Demon King of the Northern Emperor resides in the Palace of the Yin-Heaven of Zhòu’s Severed End atop the mountain.

There is a Great Demon King, surnamed Wǎn Gōng, with the taboo **__**, whose official retinue numbers thirty-eight thousand. All their names are subject to the Great King of Dispelling Demons.

Whenever later disciples attain immortality, the Great King of Dispelling Demons commands the Great Demon King to submit their names for approval, after which they may ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Great Demon King constantly seeks to thwart disciples’ studies, resenting their attainment of immortality. Once one achieves immortality, they become a perfected transcendent above the Great Demon King. Thus, disciples are often tested by the Great Demon King, and many fail, defeated by him.

If disciples know the Great Demon King’s secret name and the location of his palace, they will not be subjected to his trials and will naturally receive his endorsement for ascent to the Upper Clarity.

Disciples should regularly recite the incantation of the Hundred Spirits of the Dispelling Demons King to repel the Great Demon’s trials. Once the demonic trials are dispelled, true numina will descend, and one may behold their true form, ascending in broad daylight to the Jade Purity Palace.

The Great Demon King wears a robe of dark script, a crown spanning the heavens, and a belt with a dragon-headed sword. He often rides a feathered chariot, flying through the clouds, and sings a ballad of three thousand words to confuse and corrupt later disciples.

Thus, the Most High recorded its verses in the *Treasure Scripture of Dispelling Demons*. Those who know its tune will not be subjected to trials, nor suffer harm or corruption.

The Great Demon King of the Eastern Azure Emperor is surnamed Pò Luò, with the taboo **__**. He wears a crown spanning the heavens and a robe of azure feathers, with a belt of azure cords and a tiger-headed satchel. Sometimes he dons a crimson unlined garment or transforms into a radiance of azure and vermilion. He commands nine thousand officials and resides in the Eastern Land of Peace, the Age of Nàshàn.

On the day of the vernal equinox, he rides a feathered chariot of azure wheels, flying through the clouds to feast and roam the Five Peaks, testing and corrupting those who study immortality.

Those who cultivate the Dao of immortality should, on this day, enter their chamber facing west and recite the *Incantation of the Jade Purity Purple Dao Void Sovereign Supreme Lord for Dispelling Demons* once. Then, celestial demons will naturally perish, and one will not be tested.

After nine years, the Purple Dao Void Sovereign Supreme Lord will manifest in the disciple’s body. Through cultivation, resonance will naturally arise, and the immortal Dao will be achieved.

chunks.original_text: 十二年，则致上官玉女降兆寝房，授兆神真之道。 又紫笔黄纹上佩身，行之西北延贤世界，则万灵束带，魔王稽首礼迎，得乘飞云羽盖，游行玉清宫。 无此文，不得轻行神仙之道，呼召仙官，则为大魔所伤，身没失仙。 玉清具渭耶渠初默天合晖晨命隐书金玄内文 扶桑大帝受之於太霄真王，以传太微天帝君。 当以黄笔书苍板上，置东南方，以灭昊帝大魔王官属，招致东南方福田用贤世界昊帝仙官。 十五年，则致玉女二十四人，给兆驱使，取自然灵药飞行之丸。 又以黄书绿纹上佩身，行之用贤世界，则万灵束带，魔王稽首礼迎，得乘绿云羽盖，飞行玉清宫。 无此文，不得轻行神仙之道，呼召仙官，则为大魔所伤，身被大殃，不得仙也。 玉清冲容育郁离沙天齐晖晨玄隐书金玄内文 西王母受之於北极皇上先生，以传赤精上真君。 当以青书紫板上，置东北方，以灭苍帝大魔王官属，招致东北方福集都长安世界苍帝仙官，十年则致仙童十八人，给兆驱使，取自然灵药，高上飞玄羽章。 又以青书生紫纹上佩身，行之东北长安世界，则万灵束带，魔王稽首礼迎，得乘紫云羽盖，飞行玉清宫。 无此文，不得轻行神仙之道，呼召仙官，则为大魔所伤，身被大殃，不得仙也。 玉清单缘察宝轮法天高上龙烟隐书金玄内文 后圣九玄金阙帝君受之於高元虚皇停景君，以传上相青童君。 当以黄书绿板上，置西南方，以灭黄帝大魔王官属，招致西南方延福乡仁静之世界黄帝仙官，九年则八帝侍真玉仙降形於兆身，授兆飞仙灵药，七十四变光炼化兆身也。 又以黄书绿纹之上佩身，行之西南延福乡仁静世界，则万灵束带，魔王稽首礼迎，三元降下飞舆琼轮，迎兆登三元之房也。 无此文，不得轻行神仙之道，呼召仙官，则为大魔所伤，灭身失仙也。 玉清八天中隐书金玄内文，生於元始之先，结飞玄之气以成於玉文，即玉清天中之书也。 字方一丈，焕明太空，制魔灭精，召神摄灵。 故上圣相承，受之以威神。 此文隐藏，不传於世，自无金名兰台，玉字紫房，不得见闻。 得有其篇，高上给以玉童十二人，玉女八人，侍真典经，防卫有文者身，纠於漏慢。 轻泄则七祖受责於地狱，己身被考於三官。 钟山虚无子受之於黄老君，佩身九年，内外映彻，隐文自明，罗列一形之中，光曜九府，照明十方，身所佩本文飞入八天。 至开光元年正月一日，於钟山脱身，隐文以传郁灵真人鲍世玄。 世玄即秦穆公侍郎，今受号为郁绝真人，治在九疑山洞室之中。 后圣九玄金阙帝君，下为周师，改号为老子，以八天隐文授於幽王。 幽王自谓居自然之运，代五帝之气，错阴阳之化，不崇天文。 老子知周文衰，收文而去周西度，制作教化，遇关令尹喜，喜心结紫络，面有圆明，项带承天，背负七元，金名表於玄图，丹札系於紫房，气参太微，触形合真，即为述道德经上下二章。 於绿那之国，老子张口，於是隐文从口而出，以授於喜。 喜依盟奉受，即致八景云舆，洞游八方，竦身於虚无之内，项生宝明之光，七十二相，映照一形，随运变化，升入八天。 其道高妙，非可载称。 凡以后学，不得此文，便当绝思於遐望，无烦损神於幽山也。 上相青童君以此文传西城王君，位登四极真人，今封一通於西城山中。

**Jade Clarity’s Concealed Writ of the Golden Mystery: Possessing the Radiance of the Celestial Confluence’s Dawn Command**
Received by the Fusang Great Emperor from the Supreme Empyrean Perfected King, transmitted to the Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity.

Inscribe it in yellow upon a green tablet and place it in the Southeast to extinguish the great demon kings and their retinues of the Vast Emperor, and to summon the transcendent officials of the Southeast’s World of Cultivated Worthies in the Fields of Fortune. After fifteen years, twenty-four jade maidens will attend you, fetching natural numinous medicines and flying elixir pellets. Further, inscribe it in yellow upon green silk and wear it upon your person. When you journey to the World of Cultivated Worthies, the myriad spirits will gird themselves in attendance, and the demon kings will bow their heads in reverence, allowing you to ascend upon a canopy of verdant clouds and fly to the Jade Clarity Palace. Without this writ, you may not lightly practice the Dao of transcendence or summon transcendent officials, lest you be harmed by great demons, your body incur great calamity, and transcendence be lost.

**Jade Clarity’s Concealed Writ of the Golden Mystery: The Flourishing Dawn of the Celestial Equilibrium’s Mysterious Radiance**
Received by the Queen Mother of the West from the Supreme Master of the Northern Culmen, transmitted to the Supreme Perfected of the Vermilion Essence.

Inscribe it in blue upon a purple tablet and place it in the Northeast to extinguish the great demon kings and their retinues of the Azure Emperor, and to summon the transcendent officials of the Northeast’s World of Assembled Fortune in the Everlasting Peace of Chang’an. After ten years, eighteen transcendent youths will attend you, fetching natural numinous medicines and the supreme flying mystery feathered regalia. Further, inscribe it in blue upon living purple silk and wear it upon your person. When you journey to the Northeast’s World of Everlasting Peace, the myriad spirits will gird themselves in attendance, and the demon kings will bow their heads in reverence, allowing you to ascend upon a canopy of purple clouds and fly to the Jade Clarity Palace. Without this writ, you may not lightly practice the Dao of transcendence or summon transcendent officials, lest you be harmed by great demons, your body incur great calamity, and transcendence be lost.

**Jade Clarity’s Concealed Writ of the Golden Mystery: The Wheel of the Dharma’s High Celestial Dragon Mist**
Received by the Ninefold Mystery Golden Portal Emperor of the Later Sages from the High Origin’s Void Sovereign of Suspended Radiance, transmitted to the Grand Minister Supreme Youth.

Inscribe it in yellow upon a green tablet and place it in the Southwest to extinguish the great demon kings and their retinues of the Yellow Emperor, and to summon the transcendent officials of the Southwest’s World of Extending Fortune in the Village of Benevolent Stillness. After nine years, the Eight Emperors’ attendant perfected jade transcendent beings will manifest in your form, bestowing upon you the transcendent medicines of flying immortality and the seventy-four transformations of radiant refinement to transmute your body. Further, inscribe it in yellow upon green silk and wear it upon your person. When you journey to the Southwest’s World of Extending Fortune in the Village of Benevolent Stillness, the myriad spirits will gird themselves in attendance, and the demon kings will bow their heads in reverence. The Three Primordials will descend with flying chariots of jade wheels to welcome you into the chambers of the Three Primordials. Without this writ, you may not lightly practice the Dao of transcendence or summon transcendent officials, lest you be harmed by great demons, your body perish, and transcendence be lost.

**Jade Clarity’s Concealed Writ of the Golden Mystery: The Central Hidden Writ of the Eight Heavens**
Born before the Primordial Beginning, congealed from the qi of the flying mystery to form the jade writ—this is the writ of the Jade Clarity Heaven. Each character spans a zhang, resplendent in the vast firmament, subduing demons and extinguishing spirits, summoning gods and seizing numina. Thus, the supreme sages transmit it to one another, receiving it to wield numinous might. This writ is concealed and not transmitted to the world; without a golden name in the Orchid Terrace or jade characters in the Purple Chamber, one may neither see nor hear of it. Should one obtain this scripture, the exalted will assign twelve jade youths and eight jade maidens to attend the perfected, safeguarding the text’s bearer and correcting lapses of negligence. To lightly divulge it is to consign one’s seven ancestors to punishment in the earth prisons and to subject one’s own body to the Three Offices’ interrogation.

The Master of the Void of Mount Bell received it from the Yellow Venerable Lord. After wearing it for nine years, his inner and outer being became luminously transparent, the concealed writ manifesting of itself. It arrayed within his form, its radiance illuminating the nine palaces, shining upon the ten directions. The original writ he wore flew into the Eight Heavens. In the first year of the Kai-Guang era, on the first day of the first month, he shed his body at Mount Bell, and the concealed writ was transmitted to the Perfected of Profound Spirit, Bao Shixuan. Shixuan was once the attendant of Duke Mu of Qin and is now titled the Perfected of Profound Absoluteness, dwelling in the grotto chambers of Mount Jiuyi.

The Ninefold Mystery Golden Portal Emperor of the Later Sages descended to become the teacher of the Zhou, changing his title to Laozi. He transmitted the Concealed Writ of the Eight Heavens to King You. King You, deeming himself to dwell in the course of natural destiny, to succeed the qi of the Five Emperors, and to regulate the transformations of yin and yang, did not revere the celestial writ. Laozi, knowing the decline of the Zhou’s culture, retrieved the writ and departed, crossing west of the Zhou. There, he established teachings and transformations, encountering the Pass Prefect Yin Xi. Xi’s heart was bound by purple cords, his face bore a circular luminance, his neck bore the Mandate of Heaven, his back carried the Seven Primordials, his golden name was inscribed upon the Mystery Chart, and his cinnabar tally was tied to the Purple Chamber. His qi aligned with the Grand Tenuity, and his form merged with the perfected. Thus, he expounded the *Scripture of the Dao and Its Virtue* in two chapters.

In the land of Lǜnà, Laozi opened his mouth, and the concealed writ emerged from it to be transmitted to Xi. Xi, adhering to the covenant, received it and thereby summoned the cloud chariot of the Eight Effulgences, roaming freely through the eight directions. He ascended into the void, his neck radiating the light of precious luminosity, his seventy-two marks illuminating his form. Following the course of transformation, he ascended into the Eight Heavens. His Dao is lofty and wondrous, beyond all description.

For all later learners who do not obtain this writ, it is fitting to cease yearning for distant visions and to spare their spirit the weariness of secluded mountains.

The Grand Minister Supreme Youth transmitted this writ to the Perfected King of the Western City, who ascended to the rank of Perfected of the Four Culmens. Now, one copy is sealed within the Western City Mountain.
